Notes

This version was defective enough to require a fixed version 4 months later, which can be found here: [r5463729] To tell them apart check the runout etchings. The defective version has "08 49872 20 1A1 WARPLP 70" on side A, the fixed version has "98204 1A WARPLP 70 [NS]" on side A. "1986 Summer Fire" is unlisted on the sleeve notes. Recorded summer 1995 at Hexagon Sun. ℗ 2002 Warp Records Ltd. © 2013 Warp Records Ltd. Made in EU. Originally released in 1995 on Music70 Records. Issued in a white die-cut cardboard cover with two stickers attached on front. Both center labels have two stickers each with tracklist and credits. Download card and a yellow-green Boards Of Canada sticker are also included inside. Mastered from original (damaged) metalwork (hence why it needed a replacement edition in Feb 2014).
